projects.title: Product Planning & Delivery Simulation - Product Team Lead
projects.description: Led a cross-functional team through end-to-end product planning, from requirements definition to launch readiness, delivering the project on time. Applied gap and impact assessments to reduce projected lead time by 15% and strengthen delivery planning.

projects.title: Product & Market Analysis - Consumer Retail Brand (Fossil Watches)
projects.description: Conducted a comprehensive product and brand analysis using customer insights, competitor benchmarks, and brand equity frameworks. Synthesized findings into actionable recommendations for pricing, digital engagement, and feature positioning.

projects.title: AI-Powered File Renaming Tool
projects.description: An AI-powered file renaming tool that uses machine learning to intelligently suggest and apply meaningful file names based on content analysis.

projects.title: Real-Time Interactive Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A real-time interactive dashboard built with Python and Streamlit for data visualization and analytics, featuring live data updates and customizable charts.

projects.title: Customer Trends Data Analysis Pipeline
projects.description: End-to-end data analysis project analyzing customer behavior trends using SQL for data extraction, Python for processing, and Power BI for interactive visualizations.

projects.title: Customer Cohort Retention Analysis
projects.description: Customer cohort analysis project that segments users by acquisition date to track retention rates, lifetime value, and behavioral patterns over time.

projects.title: Agile User Story Best Practices Guide
projects.description: A comprehensive guide and template repository demonstrating best practices for writing effective user stories in Agile product development.
